name: Submit Final Documentation
description: Prepare and submit the final documentation, ensuring all required sections and visuals are included.

name: Conduct Sprint Planning Meeting
description: Organize a sprint planning meeting with the team to discuss goals and assign tasks for the upcoming sprint.

name: Perform Quality Assurance
description: Carry out quality assurance checks on the latest codebase and resolve any identified issues.

name: Prepare Client Demo
description: Create a demo presentation for the client, highlighting key features and project progress.

name: Improve Database Performance
description: Review and enhance database performance by optimizing queries and indexing tables.

name: Gather UI/UX Feedback
description: Collect feedback from users and designers regarding the latest UI/UX changes and usability.

name: Integrate Payment API
description: Connect and test the payment API to ensure secure and reliable transaction processing.
